actions.value: You can carry two additional "Orb" items.
At the beginning of a round, after al ability cards have been revealed gain %game.condition.invisible%
During your turn perform "%game.action.teleport% 5". This Teleport must end in a hex containing a treasure tile or money token.
During your rangedAttack ability, place your character token on one of the target of the attack. That enemy loses %game.action.fly% after the attack.
During your melee attack ability, add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.stun% to one attack.
Remove one %game.attackmodifier.minus2% modifier card from your modifier deck.
When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.ice% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack and flip this card over.

actionsBack.value: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.fire% to gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack and flip this card over.

actions.value: During your Heal, ability targeting Self, affect one ally within %game.action.range:3% instead.
When you are adjacent to two or more enemies gain %game.action.retaliate% 1.
When damaged by an attack perform a "%game.action.heal% X, %game.action.range:3%" ability after the attack, where X is the damage you suffered.
During your melee Attack ability, before modifiers are draw, add +2 %game.action.attack% to one attack if your first modifier drawn is positive.
During your turn, add +1 %game.action.range% to your next ranged ability.
During your Move ability, perform a %game.action.teleport% ability of equal value instead.
During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform "%game.action.attack% 2".
During your turn, you and all allies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.strengthen%, an all enemies within %game.action.range:2% gain %game.condition.muddle%.
During your heal ability, add %game.condition.bless%, or %game.condition.empower%, %game.condition.empower%, %game.condition.empower% to a single heal.
During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.curse%, or %game.condition.enfeeble%, %game.condition.enfeeble%, %game.condition.enfeeble% to a one attack.
During your melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 1 and %game.condition.wound% to one attack.
During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.wound% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.  You may consue %game.card.lost% this item instead to gain ADD %game.target%.
During your turn perform "%game.condition.dodge%, %game.action.range:5%".
At the beginning of a round, after all ability cards have been revealed, change your leading initiative value to 100-X where X is the initiative value of your leading card.
You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%, even if this item is spent.  When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and gain %game.condition.dodge% after the attack.
During your turn, remove negative condition from Self and perform "%game.action.heal% 3, Self". This can be used while you have %game.condition.stun%.
During your melee Attack ability, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +2 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack.
After you kill an enemy during your turn, gain two "%Rage%" ^TOA6^ cards.
